attributes.action: make first 1 hour of parking free in Dunstable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people in Dunstable have felt that they have not been listened to for so long, so much so that people have stopped talking! 

But enough, is enough, it is now time to put forward our needs and desires for the town. This is perfect timing as the Dunstable Masterplan and its initiatives have just been launched and are being discussed at present. 

So this is the perfect time to sign up for what might bring people back into the town for shopping and a bite to eat in one of our lovely coffee shops or pubs. 

Sign the petition now and we will present this to Andrew Selous MP who is already supporting us!
